data.name: klavogonki_NoWhiteContour
data.description:
Когда вы назначаете темную тему на клавогонках дефолтные смайлики клавогонок не призваны быть самыми идеальными на фонах ниже среднего тона
Поэтому и был создан этот стиль чтобы можно было им заменить тухляк на приятный для глаз их вид

data.name: Flight Rising Item Window Expander
data.description: A simple style which increases the size of the item window to make scrolling through lots of items easier.

data.name: FunFile Modern Redesign
data.description: A More Modern Design For FunFile. Important: If you're having issues updating this style first uninstall it, then reload the page and install it again after selecting your settings. I highly recommend using Stylus over Stylish for both Firefox and Chrome and other supported browsers, mainly because that is what i use for my browsers when i create these styles. Here's a link to the add-on: Stylus for Firefox Stylus for Chrome If you have any issues, questions or feedback, you can contact me here Adam-J-Frost@outlook.com. If you would like to help me out, you can donate to me here: Donate via Ko-fi. I hope you like this style and thank you for using it!

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!

data.name: TUMBLR // New No Resize Images | Beta version
data.description: Based on the incredible useful but no longer functional Tumblr Image Width: No Rescaling , this code will effectively prevent tumblr from resizing any image. Please see additional info for more details.

data.name: ArchLinux.org Dark
data.description:
A dark theme for ArchLinux.org, with inspiration from Solarized Dark.

Affects: Home, Packages, and AUR pages

May or may not have an effect on the other pages. I might complete this later.
